channel.title: Comments on: 10 Questions with Apologies to Bernard Pivot & James Lipton

item.title: By: Jim Munson
item.dc:creator: Jim Munson
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/staff.library.ucsf.edu/2018/06/05/10-questions-with-apologies-to-bernard-pivot-james-lipton-24/#comment-811">Jason Hedrick</a>.
Haha! But is it a GOOD thing? Perhaps Jon needs to check it out and report back? That said, I have tasted & enjoyed blue cheese ice cream...
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Jason Hedrick.

Haha! But is it a GOOD thing? Perhaps Jon needs to check it out and report back? That said, I have tasted & enjoyed blue cheese ice cream…

item.title: By: Jason Hedrick
item.dc:creator: Jason Hedrick
item.description: Just FYI, cheddar ice cream is a thing: https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/2014/11/cheddar-cheese-ice-cream-apple-pie.html
item.content:encoded: Just FYI, cheddar ice cream is a thing: https://www.seriouseats.com/recipes/2014/11/cheddar-cheese-ice-cream-apple-pie.html
